channel.title: MC Stripeypants
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "MC Stripeypants" - how i can get him

item.title: Re: MC Stripeypants
item.content:encoded: I wish I would have known you had to be Sp. Jonin back when I was Chunin and tring to get him for days -_-'

item.title: Re: MC Stripeypants
item.content:encoded:
No. Anything you can get at one rank, you should be able to get at higher ranks.

The only reason you'd have to be a Sp. Jonin is because the mission is a B rank, so you need to have access to B rank missions. So if you're a chunin or genin, the mission just won't show up.

item.title: Re: MC Stripeypants
item.content:encoded: so does this mean you can only get him when you're a sp. jonin? i'm a regular jonin, or is it sp. jonin and higher?

item.title: Re: MC Stripeypants
item.content:encoded: lucky me… i got stripey on my 2nd try, on the first day i tried. lol.

item.title: Re: MC Stripeypants
item.content:encoded: thanks i'll try the ichi special. wish me luck

item.title: Re: MC Stripeypants
item.content:encoded: if your trying to get Mc Stripeypants and are a special jonin you cant get fletch because hes an A rank reaper mission. But I recommend Ichi Special if your village has a ramen shop to increase your chances.

item.title: Re: MC Stripeypants
item.content:encoded: what about .. having fletch in ur team !.. i think he can help too!

item.title: Re: MC Stripeypants
item.content:encoded: It seems the "C-rank" deal at the shop mission acts like, and has the difficulty of, a B-rank mission.

item.title: Re: MC Stripeypants
item.content:encoded: And you have to be a Special Jounin to get him.

item.title: Re: MC Stripeypants
item.content:encoded:
I am currently a Whiteeye… so that makes getting him a lot easier.

Alas, the only thing you can do is keep running it (and keep shorty and stawberry, petals are a nice bonus!)

item.title: MC Stripeypants
item.content:encoded: how i can get him? i do the mission over 2oth time but i still didn't get him. did i have to use some specific justsu or ally? i used strawberry, shorty and robogirl and i always success the mission. did anyone have advice?
